name: The Chronicles of Batarayudha
description:
The Chronicles of Bharatayudha told the tale of brotherhood feud between Pandawa and Kurawa as they fight for the throne of Hastinapura Kingdom. The fight then triggered the royal battle of Bharatayudha at Kurusetra field.

The main characters of the battle are five Pandawa knights: Yudhistira, Arjuna, Bima, Nakula and Sadewa. They fought against Kurawa, which was led by Duryudana, to seize the Hastinapura throne. The war took many casualties from both sides, Pandawa and Kurawa.
